content: {"name": "Ethos Veronica Smith Caf\u00e9", "alternate_name": "", "description": "For more information or to register to attend a Community Cafe near you, please call 617-477-6688 or email ethosmeals@ethocare.org.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.ethocare.org/services/nutrition/community-cafes/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "20 Chestnut Hill Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Brighton", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02135", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3482358, "longitude": -71.15345950000001}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 477-6688", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}]}
